column2: create table SqlStatement( --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H a row for each distinct SQL statement in the SQL Log.   ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/T See also the SqlLogAll view that denomalizes the table. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 	statementID		int identity(#,#) not null primary key, --/D unique identifier 	statement		varchar(#) not null,                 --/D the SQL statement     hits            int not null,                           --/D how many times it occurred in the log.  	TemplateID	    int not null							--/D id of generic version of this statement.     ) go
